languages.text: {n}Коварно обманув саботажников, еретики, присягнувшие Вольному Торговцу, поразили {mf|его|ее} врагов особо разрушительным мусорным кодом, от которого истлевали даже благодатные инфоангелы и полные скверны схизматикали. {/n}

{n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Коварно обманув саботажников, еретики, присягнувшие Вольному Торговцу, поразили {mf|его|ее} врагов особо разрушительным мусорным кодом, от которого истлевали даже благодатные инфоангелы и полные скверны схизматикали. {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}By treacherously tricking the saboteurs, the heretics who swore to the Rogue Trader have struck [mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code, that could make even the gracious Info-Angels and the corrupted Schismaticals turn into dust.{/n}

{n}By treacherously tricking the saboteurs, the heretics who swore to the Rogue Trader have struck [mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code, that could make even the gracious Info-Angels and the corrupted Schismaticals turn into dust.{/n}

{n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

{n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

{n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

{n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些向行商浪人发誓效忠的异端分子突然反戈一击，使用充满破坏性的废码打击了{mf|他|她}的敌人。在废码的打击之下，神圣的数据天使和堕落的分离者同时灰飞烟灭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些向行商浪人发誓效忠的异端分子突然反戈一击，使用充满破坏性的废码打击了{mf|他|她}的敌人。在废码的打击之下，神圣的数据天使和堕落的分离者同时灰飞烟灭。{/n}
{n}那些向行商浪人发誓效忠的异端分子狡诈地欺骗了破坏者，使用颇具破坏性的废码打击了{mf|他|她}的敌人。在废码的打击之下，仁慈的数据天使和堕落的分离者同时灰飞烟灭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En un astuto acto traicionero, los herejes que habían jurado servir a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente atacaron a sus enemigos con un código de chatarra especialmente devastador que exterminó incluso a los benditos ángeles de datos y a los cismáticos corruptos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En un astuto acto traicionero, los herejes que habían jurado servir a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente atacaron a sus enemigos con un código chatarra especialmente devastador que exterminó incluso a los benditos ángeles de datos y a los cismáticos corruptos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}自由開拓者に忠誠を誓った異端者たちは、破壊工作員を裏切り、気品あるデータ・エンジェルや腐敗した分裂せし者たちでさえ塵と化す、特別に壊滅的な破壊コードを使い、その敵を打ちのめした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓った異端者たちは、破壊工作員を裏切り、気品あるデータ・エンジェルや腐敗した分裂せし者たちでさえ塵と化す、特別に壊滅的な破壊コードを使い、その敵を打ちのめした。{/n}
{n}ローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓った異端者たちは、破壊工作員を裏切り、気品あるデータ・エンジェルや腐敗した分裂せし者たちでさえ塵と化す、特別に壊滅的な破壊コードを使い、その敵を打ちのめした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans un acte de trahison bien préparé, les hérétiques ayant juré allégeance {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} frappent ses ennemis avec un code suffisamment dévastateur pour anéantir aussi bien les anges numériques bénis que les schismatiques corrompus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans un acte de trahison bien préparé, les hérétiques ayant juré allégeance {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} frappent ses ennemis avec un code suffisamment dévastateur pour anéantir aussi bien les anges numériques bénis que les schismatiques corrompus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In einem kühnen Akt des Verrats belegten die Ketzer, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die Treue geschworen hatten, {mf|seine|ihre} Feinde mit einem besonders verheerenden Schadcode, der selbst die gesegneten Datenengel und verderbten Abtrünnigen zu Staub zerfallen lässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In einem kühnen Akt des Verrats belegten die Ketzer, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die Treue geschworen hatten, {mf|seine|ihre} Feinde mit einem besonders verheerenden Schadcode, der selbst die gesegneten Datenengel und verderbten Abtrünnigen zu Staub zerfallen lässt.{/n}

{n}Die Ketzer, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die Treue beschworen haben, haben die Saboteure heimtückisch hereingelegt. Sie haben die Feinde {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit einem besonders verheerenden Schadcode attackiert, der selbst die anmutigen Datenengel und die korrumpierten Abtrünnigen zu Staub zerfallen lässt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir'e yeminle bağlanan kâfirler, sabotajcıları kandırıp onlara ihanet ederek kutsanmış veri meleklerini ve hatta yoz bölücüleri tuzla buz edecek kudrette bir hurda koduyla düşmanlarını sarstı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a cunning act of betrayal, the heretics who had sworn oaths to the Rogue Trader afflicted {mf|his|her} enemies with a particularly devastating scrap-code that made even the blessed data-angels and the corrupted schismaticals wither to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hür Tacir'e yeminle bağlanan kâfirler, sabotajcıları kandırıp onlara ihanet ederek kutsanmış veri meleklerini ve hatta yoz bölücüleri tuzla buz edecek kudrette bir hurda koduyla düşmanlarını sarstı.{/n}
